bug_description: When changing an option in Chat settings (e.g., permissions or notification settings), the app fails to save the change and shows an error dialog saying “There was an error saving chat settings”.
action: Open Chat → tap the menu on the chat list page → select “Chat settings” → change any setting option (e.g., switch ‘Who can start threads?’ or toggle a setting).
expected_state: The selected chat setting should be saved successfully, the UI should reflect the new value, and no error dialog should appear.
